location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, on the charges paid by Bruce for boat hire and feeding asses, and requesting to discontinue the latter.
